name: Mansi
greetingText: With all the love in my heart!
wishText: May the Lord Krishna always be with you! And you be with Me! Lol ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Love!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday Love! May God fill your life with loads of love and lots of dogs!
outroText: Okay, now miss me and love me.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
